flawed_nl_solution:
In 5 years, Heath will be 16 + 5 = <<16+5=21>>21 years old.
In 5 years, Jude will be 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7>>7 years old.
The difference in their ages is 21 - 7 = <<21-7=13>>13 years.
Today, Jude will be 16 - 13 = <<16-13=3>>3 years old.
